artist: Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Folded sheet from fashion periodical with music sheet (P.15,523-P.15,524); woman at left in yellow and white striped gown with a hat of yellow and blue plumes; woman at right in dark blue gown with red accents and a blue hat with two blue plumes
portfolio: From Journal de la Mode et du Goût, ou amusemens du salon et de la toilette, Paris, 1790–92
title: Fashion plate from Journal de la Mode et du Goût, Dix-neuvième Cahier, 25 Août 1790
